thread.title: Mariah Carey tells pregnant pal Beyoncé having twins is an "incredible experience"
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey tells pregnant pal Beyoncé having twins is an "incredible experience"

author: Vicki Newman
title: Mariah Carey tells pregnant pal Beyoncé having twins is an "incredible experience"
text:
Mariah Carey tells pregnant pal Beyoncé having twins is an "incredible experience" The Halo singer announced this week that she's expecting twins with husband Jay Z Share Mariah Carey has assured Beyonce that having twins will be "incredible" Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Becoming the mother of twins would surely be daunting for anyone, but Mariah Carey has stepped in to assure her pal Beyoncé that it'll be "incredible". 
Queen Bey announced this week that she's expecting twins with husband Jay Z . 
Mariah sent her congratulations to the couple, telling them that having twins is the "most incredible experience ever". 
The Hero hitmaker - who has five-year-old Moroccan and Monroe with ex-husband Nick Cannon - commented on Beyoncé's Instagram announcement, writing: "Congrats Bey and Jay!!! I'm so happy for you both. Read More Beyonce announced she's expecting twins on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/beyonce) 
"Having twins is the most incredible experience ever! Love, Mariah and the twins." 
In December, the Fantasy hitmaker revealed Beyoncé, 35, had attended one of her All I Want for Christmas is You concerts in New York. 
She shared a picture of them both backstage and wrote: "I love you @beyonce thank you s much for coming out tonight!(sic)" Mariah and Beyonce are good pals Mariah with her twins Moroccan and Monroe (Photo: Splash) 
And last year, Mariah admitted she would love to record a song with the Crazy in Love hitmaker, who is already mum to Blue Ivy, five. 
She said: "I love Beyoncé. She knows this, most people know that. I'm a fan, I love her, and we have fun together, like, she's a fun person, she's really cool. I would love to do a collaboration with her." 
Meanwhile, Beyoncé has smashed Instagram's record for the most-liked post with her first pregnancy picture. Beyonce has posed for a number of amazing pregnancy pictures (Photo: Beyonce.com) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
